{"id":"chatcmpl-658","object":"chat.completion","created":1766513409,"model":"gpt-oss:120b-cloud","system_fingerprint":"fp_ollama","choices":[{"index":0,"message":{"role":"assistant","content":"{"decision":"continue","newEvidence":[]}","reasoning":"We have a task: "Find the first dialogue between two characters that are named in the text (e.g., lines starting with a name followed by colon or quoted speech). Return the dialogue snippet and the names of the characters."

We have snapshot evidenceCount 1, recentEvidencePointers includes "14:1.1.1.p11". So there was already one evidence found in previous batch.

Now we need to scan current batch items for candidate evidence. Items are:

15:1.1.1.p12: markdown "– Для чего понадобилась ещё эта блинистая теория, если и без того ясно, что лунные кратеры – это просто вулканы?" This is a dash preceding a line, likely dialogue but not named. No name.

16:1.1.1.p13: "Знайка отвечал, что вулкан – это очень большая гора, на верхушке которой имеется сравнительно небольшой кратер, то есть отверстие. Если бы хоть один лунный кратер был кратером вулкана, то сам вулкан был бы величиной чуть ли не во всю Луну, а этого вовсе не наблюдается." Not dialogue.

17:1.1.1.p14: "Метеоритчики говорили:" This is a phrase, not dialogue snippet.

We need dialogues with named characters, e.g., "Name: ..." or quoted speech with name. In current batch, none seem to have that. So no new evidence.

Thus decision: continue (since more batches exist, and no new evidence). newEvidence empty.

But make sure we don't include any pointers already used; none.

Thus output JSON."},"finish_reason":"stop"}],"usage":{"prompt_tokens":836,"completion_tokens":359,"total_tokens":1195}}
